name: Basketball Collection
description:
Have all of your favorite basketball arcade games in a 1 app collection! Choose from lots of different game modes and make baskets. There's a lot of different levels for each game mode, and an infinite style for each so you'll never run out of fun!

Features:
- All of your basketball favorites
- Levels & Infinite mode
- Many different basketballs to choose from
- 100% Free to play!
